meanings.sent1: The tornado will demolish the old barn.
meanings.sent2: The wrecking ball will demolish the abandoned house.
meanings.sent3: Watch out for the playful puppy, he might demolish your shoe!
meanings.sent4: Her powerful speech seemed to demolish all opposition.
meanings.sent5: The giant robot's laser beam could easily demolish entire buildings.

meanings.sent1: The champion boxer will demolish his opponent in the ring.
meanings.sent2: The experienced team will demolish their rivals in the match.
meanings.sent3: The clever cat will demolish the mouse in a game of chase.
meanings.sent4: Her strategic moves in chess seemed to demolish her friend's defenses.
meanings.sent5: The superhero's powers were enough to demolish any villain's plans.

meanings.definition: Pull down or knock down a building
meanings.sent1: The construction crew will demolish the old factory next week.
meanings.sent2: The city decided to demolish the unsafe structure.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous kids wanted to demolish the sandcastle they built.
meanings.sent4: The controlled explosion will demolish the skyscraper efficiently.
meanings.sent5: The earthquake's force was enough to demolish the historic church.
